import React from 'react'; function Experience() { return (
EXPERIENCES

March 2021 - Present

SMART Zambia Institute (Systems Developer)

Currently employed as a systems developer at SMART Zambia institute. Our core mandate is to coordinate and harmonize the implementation of electronic government services and processes in order to improve service delivery across all government ministries and spending agencies.

Jan 2021 - March 2021

TOPSTAR (Network Operations Center Technician)

Worked as Network Operations Center (NOC) Officer at Topstar Lusaka main branch stationed at Mass media. Worked with open source software, Zabbix to monitor the conditions of Topstar transmitters and sites across the country as well as maintaining transmitter equipment at the Lusaka branch.

May 2014 - June 2014

YMCA (IT Technical Support)

Configured computer systems, fixing hardware and software. Operating system installation. Performed routine hardware and software maintenance checks.

March 2013 - April 2013

ZESCO (IT Support)

Worked as IT Support (Internship) for ZESCO head office. Used business information systems to resolve computer terminal issues remotely. For instance I used vnc software to reinstall software on another employees computer remotely. This was done efficiently because I did not need to be at the employees terminal physically. During my short tenure at Zesco, learned to work with a team and as well as how to use information system software to resolve computer issues within the organization.

); } export default Experience;
